title: Kotlin data class serialization fails with GraalVM >= 22.1
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm trying to serialize a Kotlin data class with kotlinx.serialization annotations.
Everything is working as expected with GraalVM 22.0 but starts throwing errors with 22.1 and 22.2.

Data class:
```
@Serializable
@RegisterForReflection
data class Participant(
  val id: String,
  val name: String,
  val avatar: String,
  val type: String,
)
```

### Expected behavior

No error

### Actual behavior

Error during serialization. 
Stacktrace:


### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.4+8-jvmci-22.2-b06

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

GraalVM 22.2.0 Java 17 CE

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn

### Additional information

_No response_
